definition: good-looking/nice-looking/good (of a movie, book, TV show etc)/embarrassed/humiliated
to be fond of/to have a tendency to/to be prone to
good/well/proper/good to/easy to/very/so/(suffix indicating completion or readiness)/(of two people) close/on intimate terms/(after a personal pronoun) hello
to see/to look at/to read/to watch/to visit/to call on/to consider/to regard as/to look after/to treat (an illness)/to depend on/to feel (that)/(after verb) to give it a try/Watch out! (for a danger)
to look after/to take care of/to watch/to guard

sentences.english: Wear clothes that flatter and fit.
sentences.chinese: 穿着好看和合身的衣服。

sentences.english: Pendants are also favorites because they're both functional and decorative.
sentences.chinese: 我也很喜欢坠饰吊灯，因为它们既实用又好看。

sentences.english: Wife, is not good-looking, but net, delicious cheap.
sentences.chinese: 老婆，是刀鱼，不好看，但好吃便宜啊。

sentences.english: "She is what I would call a fine-looking woman, " I said, after a judicial pause.
sentences.chinese: 她是一个我会称为长相好看的女人。

sentences.english: The mist-filled valley and flickering lights below looked strangely welcoming.
sentences.chinese: 薄雾笼罩的山谷和山下闪烁的灯光出奇地好看。

sentences.english: He points to other bars he considers better-looking.
sentences.chinese: 他给我指出一些他认为好看的。

sentences.english: Kenny is not good-looking, but he is very gentle.
sentences.chinese: 肯尼长得不好看，但是他很有绅士风度。

sentences.english: Not very nice , goof lens and more.
sentences.chinese: 不怎么好看，穿帮镜头多。

sentences.english: You just swaller some of it once—you'll see.
sentences.chinese: 要不然，你现在就吞点下肚，有你好看的。

sentences.english: There are so many great shows playing; Phantom of the Opera.
sentences.chinese: 那里好看的表演太多了，比如说《歌剧魅影》。

sentences.english: The bright moon provides inspiration for my poem again.
sentences.chinese: 这么好看的明月，又给了我作诗的灵感。

sentences.english: Purple wings are on, I did not according to good, in fact, really nice.
sentences.chinese: 有对紫玉翅，我没照好，其实挺好看的。

sentences.english: Next time I see Rick, I’m going to let him have it.
sentences.chinese: 下次我看到李克时要他好看。

sentences.english: This coat looks very good on you.
sentences.chinese: 那件外套你穿着很好看。

sentences.english: She also looked good in a CSI uniform.
sentences.chinese: 她在《犯罪现场调查》里穿制服也很好看。

sentences.english: Take a look and you will love it!
sentences.chinese: 好好看一下这些照片，你一定会爱上它们。
